mapper.select: select /*+INDEX_DESC(product_tb pk_product_tb)*/rownum rn,pt_cd,pt_NM,unit,tax_NM,origin_NM,storage_NM,exp_D,category_fk,cate_NM,emp_fk,emp_NM from PRODUCT_TB p left join tax_tb t on p.tax_fk =t.tax_cd left join origin_tb o on p.origin_fk = o.origin_cd left join storage_tb s on p.storage_fk = s.storage_cd left join category_tb c on p.category_fk = c.cate_cd left join emp_tb e on p.emp_fk = e.emp_cd
select cate_cd,cate_NM from category_tb where cate_cd>0
mapper.update: update product_tb set pt_nm= #{pt_NM} , category_fk=#{category_fk}, unit=#{unit}, tax_fk=#{tax_cd}, storage_fk=#{storage_fk}, origin_fk=(select origin_cd from origin_tb where origin_nm=#{origin_NM}), exp_D=#{exp_D} where pt_cd=#{pt_cd}
